p: Finally, Mantel tests were performed to detect potential drivers of synchrony across national borders. In addition to the distance, population size, temperature, and humidity predictors outlined above, we included an additional binary variable to indicate whether two counties share the same country (0) or not (1). This binary variable was the most strongly associated predictor, and was the only variable to remain significant whilst controlling for all other predictors ( p â‰¤ 0.0001, S2 Table). Using the downsampled data from Norway and Denmark did not change these conclusions ( S3 Table), nor did excluding Swedish counties from the analysis ( S4 Table).
